quotes.quote: It is as healthy to enjoy sentiment as to enjoy jam.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Once it's jam, it can't be strawberries anymore.
quotes.author: Marilyn Wallace

quotes.quote: Some of the jam we thought was for tomorrow, we've already eaten.
quotes.author: Tony Benn

quotes.quote: Would love to go and live in the mountains... and make jam.
quotes.author: Eve Best

quotes.quote: You can't land on the moon and say, "Ooh, it's all sticky! It's covered in jam!
quotes.author: Eddie Izzard

quotes.quote: For those dependent on their gardens for fresh food, it was often a case of feast or famine (One settler wrote), Strawberries were now so plentiful that made 287 lbs of jam.
quotes.author: Bee Dawson

quotes.quote: Check out the produce bin in your fridge or your cabinet before you buy more. When you see something on the verge of going bad, freeze it, turn it into a sauce, make jam.
quotes.author: Dana Cowin

quotes.quote: When you stir your rice pudding, Septimus, the spoonful of jam spreads itself round making red trails like the picture of a meteor in my astronomical atlas. But if you stir backwards, the jam will not come together again. Indeed, the pudding does not notice and continues to turn pink just as before. Do you think this is odd?
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: Mother very easily made Jam sandwiches under no protest.
quotes.author: Diana Wynne Jones

quotes.quote: I'll use the knives for spreading jam, and the gas to warm my greying love.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Let's put the jam on the lower shelf so the little people can reach it.
quotes.author: Ralph Yarborough

quotes.quote: Someone who eats pancakes and jam can't be so awfully dangerous. You can talk to him.
quotes.author: Tove Jansson

quotes.quote: Cheese and jam are really nice. Cheese and apple as well. Cheese and grapes are good.
quotes.author: Georgie Henley

quotes.quote: And the Quangle Wangle said to himself on the crumpetty tree, jam; and jelly; and bread; are the best of food for me.
quotes.author: Edward Lear

quotes.quote: Happiness is like jam. You can't spread it without getting some on yourself.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Marmalade in the morning has the same effect on taste buds that a cold shower has on the body.
quotes.author: Jeanine Larmoth

quotes.quote: The jelly, the jam and the marmalade, and the cherry and quince preserves she made. And the sweet-sour pickles of peach and pear, with cinnamon in 'em, and all things rare. And the more we ate was the more to spare.
quotes.author: James Whitcomb Riley

quotes.quote: And he went on eating his marmalade as though everything were natural.
quotes.author: Daphne du Maurier

quotes.quote: Don't slather it with butter or margarine and ruin it. It's a good idea to use marmalade or something or just to toast it.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Hiser

quotes.quote: Because the sweeter the cake, the more bitter the jelly can be.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: Make a mean peanut butter and jelly sandwich.
quotes.author: Jack Black

quotes.quote: If we give someone a piece of bread and butter, that's kindness, but if we put jelly or peanut butter on it, then it's loving kindness.
quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

quotes.quote: The way I see it, life is a jelly doughnut. You don't really know what it's about until you bite into it. And then, just when you decided it's good, you drop a big glob of jelly on your best T-shirt.
quotes.author: Janet Evanovich

quotes.quote: Likest thou jelly within thy doughnut?
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: Never set your stomach for a jelly-bread sandwich until you're sure there's some jelly.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: You can spread jelly on the peanut butter but you can't spread peanut butter on the jelly.
quotes.author: Dick Van Dyke

quotes.quote: I can't really live outside Jamaica. I can be away, but only for a while.
quotes.author: Usain Bolt

quotes.quote: I grew up with coconuts as the main flavor in food in Jamaica. It's part of our culture.
quotes.author: Ziggy Marley

quotes.quote: I love running in nature. I don't like running on the streets, I don't like running in the city, I don't like running on the concrete. I love running in nature, so Jamaica provides a lot of that for me.
quotes.author: Ziggy Marley

quotes.quote: In Jamaica, them always have throwback riddims, recycled old beats, and the hardcore reggae scene is always present. You have faster stuff like the more commercialized stuff, but you always have that segment of music that is always from the core, from the original root of it.
quotes.author: Damian Marley

quotes.quote: I think that anybody, once we leave Jamaica, automatically, any citizen becomes an ambassador for the flag, for Jamaica. It's a country that's so rich in culture. We even have a bobsled team, and we ain't even got snow. We do everything in extreme.
quotes.author: Shaggy

quotes.quote: I'm a huge reggae fan. I want to go to Jamaica and make, like, Bob Marley 'One Love' positive songs. That's what the world needs.
quotes.author: Jenny Lewis

quotes.quote: When you're growing up in Jamaica and you don't have much, and then you gain more and more... you can now share the more that you have with the people that have less because you know what less is like.
quotes.author: Rohan Marley

quotes.quote: Jamaica is so musical, diverse and so extreme, from people singing in the streets to dancing.
quotes.author: Kreesha Turner

quotes.quote: Doing business in Jamaica is not easy, but it is rewarding.
quotes.author: Michael Lee-Chin

quotes.quote: In Jamaica, you're never very far away from people who don't have very much, and in Wilmette, pretty much everybody had a lot.
quotes.author: Peter Blair Henry

quotes.quote: Jamaica's a country of great dichotomy. On the one hand you have a tourist industry with great beaches and resorts, but on the other you have such great poverty and the violence that goes along with that.
quotes.author: Michael Franti

quotes.quote: Jamaica never gets worse or better, it just finds new ways to stay the same.
quotes.author: Marlon James

quotes.quote: When you're in Jamaica, unless you're in a tourist spot, you don't hear Bob Marley; you mostly hear dance hall music.
quotes.author: Michael Franti

quotes.quote: Jamaica is more than just the 'brand' the world recognizes so well; it's a place of pride for the people who live here, its educational institutions, its sports achievements, its science and technology growth.
quotes.author: Portia Simpson-Miller

quotes.quote: When people come to Jamaica, we don't want them to think about the problems of Jamaica. So let them come be in their paradise.
quotes.author: Ziggy Marley

quotes.quote: Jamaica is an island that is filled with so much culture.
quotes.author: Kreesha Turner

quotes.quote: In Jamaica, the music is recorded for the sound system, not the iPod. It's about experiencing music together, with other people.
quotes.author: Michael Franti

quotes.quote: Jamaican music can be aggressive, soulful, smooth and exciting all at once - just like hip-hop. At the same time, there's nothing like Jamaica in the United States. Jamaica is its own thing.
quotes.author: Nas

quotes.quote: Jamaica's probably the most dominant island as far as influence goes, as far as music and dancing and culture.
quotes.author: Joey Badass

quotes.quote: Jamaica has the best coffee, the best sugar, the best ginger and some of the best cocoa in the world.
quotes.author: Chris Blackwell

quotes.quote: Being Jamaican isn't just a nationality. It's an experience you have to love it to understand.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: In the Caribbean islands, especially in Jamaica, have I found a country similar to South Africa plus the racial freedom I had sought so long.
quotes.author: Peter Abrahams

quotes.quote: Being born in Jamaica, race was never an issue. It was always about the type of person I wanted to be, not the color of my skin.
quotes.author: Tessanne Chin

quotes.quote: Because I come from a place like Jamaica, which is a small, open economy, I viscerally get the importance of the global economy.
quotes.author: Peter Blair Henry

quotes.quote: I just wrapped my new movie here in Jamaica, where they dance, smoke grass and all the nice girls be in the voodoo trance. What a place to work.
quotes.author: Inez Wallace

quotes.quote: Jamaica, island of homegrown fun.
quotes.author: Hugh Wilson

quotes.quote: Then I want a plane ticket to Jamaica. And I want a nice hotel. No touristy place. Something really indicative of the people and their culture.
quotes.author: Jim Abrahams

quotes.quote: No more lift up, lift up, lift up in the music / The music should be clean, the music should be clean / I love you, I love you, I love you, I love you / Love you, Jamaica, Jamaica, Jamaica, love you, I love you
quotes.author: Winston Godfrey Rodney

quotes.quote: Come on Jamaica / Everybody say / We're all happy in Jamaica / Do Jamaica jerk-off that way
quotes.author: Bernie Taupin

quotes.quote: So do it Jamaica yeah / Got plenty for you and me / Honky tonking with my baby / In that deep blue sea
quotes.author: Bernie Taupin

quotes.quote: Jamaica / Comes a man with a plan to renew the world / Up in rasta land / Hungry boys and girls / He lived up to his part / And he died with a cause in his heart
quotes.author: Marvin P Gaye

quotes.quote: Jamaica / Sitting down see the flower / On the window tops / And the mountain / See the rain / And the warm lit sun / On the beaches and sand
quotes.author: Marvin P Gaye

quotes.quote: Jamaica, oh Jamaica, land in the Carib Sea / Children in their uniforms on their way to school / Adults just walking happily on their way to work / To build a new Jamaica so we can live in peace
quotes.author: Jim Croce

quotes.quote: The hills has come alive / With the rays of the morning sun / The morning breeze, it steer the trees / It sets one heart at ease / The birdie sings a melody, awakening the bees / Jamaica, Jamaica, land in the Carib Sea
quotes.author: Jim Croce

quotes.quote: Looking for a place to have a perfect vacation, / Or even a honeymoon / I know the place to make the perfect reservation, / Come let me take you there soon, yeah / To a place called Jamaica, / Where the island is in the sun
quotes.author: Dwayne Richard Chin Quee

quotes.quote: Place called Jamaica, / If you really wanna have some fun / Food is great, people is great, / One of a place, climate is great, / Down there in Jamaica
quotes.author: Dwayne Richard Chin Quee

quotes.quote: Oh what a perfect day, oh yeah / No place like Jamaica to me / But to me to go around the world / Jamaica my number one girl
quotes.author: Dwayne Richard Chin Quee

quotes.quote: Nice everytime, nice everytime, ohh / On the evening sunset / And the warm summer breeze / Rushing in, yeah / Relax at your best / Set your mind at ease / And breathe in / Jamaica sunshine
quotes.author: Dwayne Richard Chin Quee

quotes.quote: We'll be having fun / Under the golden sun / Christmas in Jamaica here we come / We'll just sail on, just sail
quotes.author: Toni Braxton

quotes.quote: Now the sun is in my eyes / And you know I'm feeling fine / Take me, (take me) take me to Jamaica now / Where the reggae rhythms beat / Can't help but move my feet
quotes.author: David Nesta Marley

quotes.quote: Take me, (take me) take me to Jamaica now / Where we can live in the country / Eat fruits from the tree / Everything's irie / The coconut water is sweet
quotes.author: David Nesta Marley

quotes.quote: Where the three little birds they sing / Blue Mountains are happy again / Feel the Caribbean breeze / Stress is calling but I can't be reached / Take me, (take me) take me to Jamaica now
quotes.author: David Nesta Marley

quotes.quote: Oh, oh, Jamaica makes her feel so high / Oh, oh Jamaica makes her come alive
quotes.author: Ferdinand Bolland

quotes.quote: Jamaica, I miss you so / I wanna dance to the feeling / Dance on the beat / I wanna dance on pure roots reggae
quotes.author: Lionel Liminana

quotes.quote: I say this is Jamaica, my Jamaica, the land of my birth. / I will never leave her shores, I will never run away. / I will always believe in the black, the green, the gold I say.
quotes.author: Winston Godfrey Rodney

quotes.quote: For some people say we poor, but the progress you make my friend is not always how rich you are. / I say this is the land of my birth; I say this is the land of my birth. / I say this is Jamaica, my Jamaica, the land of my birth.
quotes.author: Winston Godfrey Rodney

quotes.quote: Jamaica funk, that's what it is / let it get into you / Common I've got a groove / you know where I 'll be
quotes.author: Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: Almost heaven, West Jamaica / True ridge mountains / Shining down the river
quotes.author: Bill Danoff

quotes.quote: Sun of Jamaica, the dreams of Malaika / Our love is my sweet memory / Sun of Jamaica, Blue Lady Malaika / Someday I'll return, wait and see
quotes.author: Wolfgang Jass

quotes.quote: How'd I wind up in Jamaica / Washed up like some lost cast away / How did one round of beer lead to me laying here / On this bed of sand in Montego Bay
quotes.author: Casey Beathard

quotes.quote: To all those who love wild river scenery, this is an invitation to deepen your understanding and enjoyment of Jamaica's sublime and beautiful waterfalls.
quotes.author: Brian J. Hudson

quotes.quote: In Jamaica, waterfalls are commonly the result if different stream erosion in areas of relatively high relief.
quotes.author: Brian J. Hudson

quotes.quote: Rastafarians have a close relationship with nature.
quotes.author: Amber Wilson

quotes.quote: Christmas and Easter are two of the most important holidays in Jamaica. The traditions people practice combine customs from Europe and Africa.
quotes.author: Amber Wilson

quotes.quote: Jamaica is an island nation and a close neighbor of the United States. It is a masterpiece of tropical splendor and extraordinary vistas.
quotes.author: Janet H. Gritzner

quotes.quote: White sand beaches rim the north and west sides of Jamaica, and the scenic blue mountains dominate the eastern side of the country.
quotes.author: Janet H. Gritzner

quotes.quote: Jamaica is a great place for a vacation, and the island attracts thousands of visitor each year.
quotes.author: Janet H. Gritzner

quotes.quote: Jamaica is a country of contrasts. It has a multitude of problems such as urban sprawl, poverty, crime and violence, a depressed economy, and high foreign debt. Yet it is country of incredible scenic beauty, with many natural resources and a rich cultural life.
quotes.author: Janet H. Gritzner

quotes.quote: Jamaica has a rich and varied natural resources.
quotes.author: Janet H. Gritzner

quotes.quote: Jamaica has more to offer: white sand beaches framed by the turquoise ocean, the cool and misty heights of the Blue Mountains, the unique historical atmosphere of Spanish Town and Port Royal, the peaceful tranquility of Port Antionio.
quotes.author: Harry S. Pariser

quotes.quote: For a small island, Jamaica has a remarkable diversity of plant life, most of which is important from all over the world.
quotes.author: Harry S. Pariser

quotes.quote: The sea around Jamaica is also rich.
quotes.author: Harry S. Pariser

quotes.quote: For most Jamaicans, religion is much more than just paying lip service to vague ideals; it represents a total involvement, a way of life.
quotes.author: Harry S. Pariser

quotes.quote: Jamaica is a North American country in the Caribbean Sea. It has a variety of traditions and celebrations.
quotes.author: Alicia Z. Klepeis

quotes.quote: Jamaica has many beautiful places to visit. There are mountains, waterfalls, and caves.
quotes.author: Alicia Z. Klepeis

quotes.quote: Visitors come from around the world to enjoy Jamaica's beaches and play golf or scuba dive.
quotes.author: Alicia Z. Klepeis

quotes.quote: Jamaican people value the arts, music, and literature. They are known for reggae music and storytelling. They also enjoy eating spicy food and playing sports. Jamaica is a fascinating country to explore.
quotes.author: Alicia Z. Klepeis

quotes.quote: Europeans first sighted Jamaica in 1494. While they described the beauty of the island in glowing terms, it was not fields and mountains that attracted them to Jamaica. It was gold.
quotes.author: Sean Sheehan

quotes.quote: Jamaica's congenial climate attracts visitors throughout the year, and resorts such as Montego Bay are internationally renowned.
quotes.author: Sean Sheehan

quotes.quote: Javascript is the duct tape of the Internet.
quotes.author: Charlie Campbell

quotes.quote: The kind of programming that C provides will probably remain similar absolutely or slowly decline in usage, but relatively, JavaScript or its variants, or XML, will continue to become more central.
quotes.author: Dennis Ritchie

quotes.quote: Computer language design is just like a stroll in the park. Jurassic Park, that is.
quotes.author: Larry Wall

quotes.quote: JavaScript is the only language that I'm aware of that people feel they don't need to learn before they start using it.
quotes.author: Douglas Crockford

quotes.quote: Any app that can be written in JavaScript, will eventually be written in JavaScript.
quotes.author: Jeff Atwood

quotes.quote: JavaScript is not a functional programming language like Lisp or Haskell, but the fact that JavaScript can manipulate functions as objects means that we can use functional programming techniques in JavaScript.
quotes.author: David Flanagan

quotes.quote: JavaScript: Don't judge me by my bad parts, learn the good stuff and stick with that!
quotes.author: Eric Freeman

quotes.quote: JavaScript: This is a super-popular programming language primarily used in web apps. But it doesn't have much to do with Java besides the name. JavaScript runs a lot of the modern web, but it also catches a lot of flak for slowing browsers down and sometimes exposing users to security vulnerabilities.
quotes.author: Dmitry Baranovskiy

quotes.quote: JavaScript is the world's most misunderstood programming language.
quotes.author: Douglas Crockford

quotes.quote: Technically, web browsers can control what users see, and sites using Javascript can overwrite anything coming from the original authors. Browsers heavily utilize Javascript to create an interactive Internet; sites like YouTube, Facebook, and Gmail could be crippled without it.
quotes.author: Ben Shapiro

quotes.quote: There is no programming languageâ€“no matter how structuredâ€“that will prevent programmers from making bad programs.
quotes.author: Larry Flon

quotes.quote: The secret to building large apps is never build large apps. Break your applications into small pieces. Then, assemble those testable, bite-sized pieces into your big application.
quotes.author: Justin Meyer

quotes.quote: When someone says, "I want a programming language in which I need only say what I want done," give him a lollipop.
quotes.author: Alan Perlis

quotes.quote: Programming languages are like girlfriends: The new one is better because *you* are better.
quotes.author: Derek Sivers

quotes.quote: You should imagine variables as tentacles, rather than boxes. They do not contain values, they grasp them â€• two variables can refer to the same value.
quotes.author: Marjin Haverbeke

quotes.quote: JavaScript is as related to Java as Carnival is to Car.
quotes.author: Kyle Simpson

quotes.quote: Lisp isn't a language, it's a building material.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.quote: JS will be a real functional language.
quotes.author: Douglas Crockford

quotes.quote: A language like Ruby is a toolbox with some really neat little tools that do their job really nicely. JavaScript is a leather sheath with a really really sharp knife inside. That knife can cut anything, and with it you can do anything. You can kill a bear. You can catch fish. You can whittle a piece of wood into a pony. It's even a toothpick.
quotes.author: Nick Morgan

quotes.quote: Java is to JavaScript as ham is to hamster.
quotes.author: Jeremy Keith

quotes.quote: JavaScript doesn't have a classical object-oriented model, where you create objects from classes. In fact, JavaScript doesn't have classes at all. In JavaScript, objects inherit behavior from other objects, which we call prototypal inheritance, or inheritance based on prototypes.
quotes.author: Eric Freeman

quotes.quote: Fine, Java MIGHT be a good example of what a programming language should be like. But Java applications are good examples of what applications SHOULDN'T be like.
quotes.author: pixadel

quotes.quote: Fortunately, JavaScript has some extraordinarily good parts. In JavaScript, there is a beautiful, elegant, highly expressive language that is buried under a steaming pile of good intentions and blunders.
quotes.author: Douglas Crockford

quotes.quote: The strength of JavaScript is that you can do anything. The weakness is that you will.
quotes.author: Reg Braithwaite

quotes.quote: If you're talking about Java in particular, Python is about the best fit you can get amongst all the other languages. Yet the funny thing is, from a language point of view, JavaScript has a lot in common with Python, but it is sort of a restricted subset.
quotes.author: Guido van Rossum

quotes.quote: Node.js is a tumor on the programming community, in that not only is it completely braindead, but the people who use it go on to infect other people who can't think for themselves.
quotes.author: Ted Dziuba

quotes.quote: Java is to JavaScript what car is to carpet.
quotes.author: Chris Heilmann

quotes.quote: A Netscape engineer who shan't be named once passed a pointer to JavaScript, stored it as a string and later passed it back to C, killing 30
quotes.author: Blake Ross

quotes.quote: JavaScript's global scope is like a public toilet. You can't avoid going in there, but try to limit your contact with surfaces when you do.
quotes.author: Dmitry Baranovskiy

quotes.quote: Go is the language JavaScript programmers retire to when they get old. Like the Florida of programming languages.
quotes.author: Jed Schmidt

quotes.quote: Forgive me if I don't have the words. Maybe I can sing it & you'll understand.
quotes.author: Ella Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Jazz stands for freedom.
quotes.author: Dave Brubeck

quotes.quote: Without jazz, life would be a mistake.
quotes.author: Boris Vian

quotes.quote: If a Jazz musician plays someone else's song, he has a responsibility to make a distinct & original statement.
quotes.author: Todd Boyd

quotes.quote: Jazz is the false liquidation of art, instead of utopia becoming reality it disappears from the picture.
quotes.author: Theodor W. Adorno

quotes.quote: Jazz is not dead, it just smells funny.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: A Jazz man should be saying what he feels: humor, sadness, joy all the things that humans have.
quotes.author: Bob Brookmeyer

quotes.quote: Jazz is about being in the moment.
quotes.author: Herbie Hancock

quotes.quote: Jazz is the big brother of Revolution. Revolution follows it around.
quotes.author: Miles Davis

quotes.quote: If jazz has to be termed as a wave, then music is a sea, but if the reflectors in the water is the chord.
quotes.author: Thelonious Monk

quotes.quote: Jazz is a beautiful woman whose older brother is a policeman.
quotes.author: Sid Caesar

quotes.quote: It pulled me like a magnet, jazz did, because it was a way that I could express myself.
quotes.author: Herbie Hancock

quotes.quote: Jazz is something you have to feel, something you have to live.
quotes.author: Ray Brown

quotes.quote: I still love the whole history of jazz. The old things sound better than ever.
quotes.author: Steve Lacy

quotes.quote: Jazz is a white term to define black people. My music is black classical music.
quotes.author: Nina Simone

quotes.quote: It bugs me when people try to analyze jazz as an intellectual theorem. It's not. It's feeling.
quotes.author: Bill Evans

quotes.quote: Jazz is one of the best things that you can find in your life, it can always be your friend.
quotes.author: George Gershwin

quotes.quote: If a jazz player is really playing, the classical player will have to respect him.
quotes.author: Wes Montgomery

quotes.quote: The essentials of Jazz are: melodic improvisation, melodic invention, swing & instrumental personality.
quotes.author: Mose Allison

quotes.quote: Jazz is the sound of surprise.
quotes.author: Whitney Balliett

quotes.quote: It's the group sound that's important, even when you're playing a solo. You not only have to know your own instrument, you must know the others and how to back them up at all times. That's jazz.
quotes.author: Oscar Peterson

quotes.quote: Jazz is a spectacularly accurate model of democracy & a look into our redemptive future possibilities.
quotes.author: Ken Burns

quotes.quote: That's the thing about jazz: it's free flowing, it comes from your soul.
quotes.author: Billy Crystal

quotes.quote: By & large Jazz has always been like the kind of a man you wouldn't want your daughter to associate with.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: One chord is fine. Two chords are pushing it. Three chords and you're into jazz.
quotes.author: Lou Reed

quotes.quote: Jazz was not only built in the minds of the great ones, but on the backs of the ordinary ones.
quotes.author: Cab Calloway

quotes.quote: Jazz music doesn't have an expiration date.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Jazz was born out of the whiskey bottle, was raised on marijuana, and will expire on cocaine.
quotes.author: Artie Shaw

quotes.quote: Anyone who understands Jazz knows that you can't understand it. It's too complicated. That's what's so simple about it.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Jazz is the assassination, the murdering, the slaying of syncopation. I would even go so far as to confess that we are musical anarchists.
quotes.author: Nick La Rocca

quotes.quote: The day of the great jazz improviser who doesn't know how to read music is over.
quotes.author: Maynard Ferguson

quotes.quote: The genius of our country is improvisation, and jazz reflects that. It's our great contribution to the arts.
quotes.author: Ken Burns

quotes.quote: It takes an intelligent ear to listen to Jazz.
quotes.author: Art Blakey

quotes.quote: If you have to ask what jazz is, you'll never know.
quotes.author: Louis Armstrong

quotes.quote: Life is a lot like jazz. It's best when you improvise.
quotes.author: George Gershwin

quotes.quote: It's not exclusive, but inclusive, which is the whole spirit of jazz.
quotes.author: Herbie Hancock

quotes.quote: You will never know what the meaning of Jazz is if ask what it means.
quotes.author: Louis Armstrong

quotes.quote: I don't get jazz. It always sounds like a bunch of toddlers let loose in a music room.
quotes.author: Libba Bray

quotes.quote: Jazz is an open ended music designed for open minds.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Jazz is played from the heart. You can even live by it. Always love it.
quotes.author: Louis Armstrong

quotes.quote: When you are studying Jazz best thing to do is listen to records & live music as much you can & absorb everything.
quotes.author: Carla Bley

quotes.quote: Jazz is the only music in which the same note can be played night after night but differently each time.
quotes.author: Ornette Coleman

quotes.quote: A jazz musician is a juggler who uses harmonies instead of oranges.
quotes.author: Benny Green

quotes.quote: If you're in jazz and more than ten people like you, you're labeled commercial.
quotes.author: Herbie Mann

quotes.quote: It doesn't mean a thing / If it ain't got that swing.
quotes.author: Irving Mills

quotes.quote: Jazz music is to be played sweet, soft, plenty rhythm.
quotes.author: Jelly Roll Morton

quotes.quote: Jazz will endure, just as long as people hear it through their feet instead of their brains.
quotes.author: John Philip Sousa

quotes.quote: What a terrible revenge by the culture of the Negroes on that of the Whites!
quotes.author: Ignacy Jan Paderewski

quotes.quote: Jazz is the big brother of the blues. If a guy's playing blues, he's in high school. When he starts playing jazz, it's like going on to college, to a school of higher learning.
quotes.author: B.B. King

quotes.quote: The word jazz in its progress toward respectability has meant first sex, then dancing, then music.
quotes.author: F.Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: If they act too hip, you know they can't play.
quotes.author: Louis Armstrong

quotes.quote: There's more bad music in jazz than any other form. Maybe that's because the audience doesn't really know what's happening.
quotes.author: Pat Metheny

quotes.quote: It's like an act of murder. You play with intent to commit something.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: What is jazz? It's almost like asking, What is French? Jazz is a musical language— a dialect that actually embodies the spirit of America.
quotes.author: Branford Marsalis

quotes.quote: The music of the body.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Jazz and love are the hardest things to describe from rationale.
quotes.author: Mel Torme

quotes.quote: Jazz music is an intensified feeling of nonchalance.
quotes.author: Francoise Sagan

quotes.quote: Jazz is five guys playing different songs.
quotes.author: Steve McGrew

quotes.quote: First, you master your instrument, then you master the music, then you forget all that shit and just play.
quotes.author: Charlie Parker

quotes.quote: If you don't live it, it won't come out of your horn.
quotes.author: Charlie Parker

quotes.quote: There are no wrong notes.
quotes.author: Thelonius Monk

quotes.quote: Beiderbecke took out a silver cornet. He put it to his lips and blew a phrase. The sound came out like a girl saying yes.
quotes.author: Eddie Condo

quotes.quote: Milton, of all people, gave the most perfect definition of the state of mind required to play jazz: 'with wanton heed and giddy cunning.' That's how you play jazz.
quotes.author: Paul Desmond

quotes.quote: Jazz came to America three hundred years ago in chains.
quotes.author: Paul Whiteman

quotes.quote: If you wanted to get into jazz, you had to go downtown where the pimps, prostitutes, hustlers, gangsters, and gamblers supported the music. If it wasn't for them there would be no jazz.
quotes.author: Betty Carter

quotes.quote: Jazz was invented for people to dance to, we can't get away from that. My music calls for listening but it'll still make you shake your head and pat your feet.
quotes.author: Dizzy Gillespie

quotes.quote: Jazz is like an addict on crack, / It gets inside of you, and then / It becomes your very best friend. / Once you go Jazz, you'll never go back!
quotes.author: Kenneth R. Jenkins

quotes.quote: Jazz without melody, / an arm with no hand / A heart without blood / —a sea with no land.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: Sing me to sleep when I go west / The latest thing you know / In jazz; and sing with brutal zest / While the saxophones moan low / And the squawkers squawk and the banjos strum / To the bang and the boom of the big bass drum.
quotes.author: Clarence Michael James Stanislaus Dennis

quotes.quote: Take some skins, / Jazz begins, / Take a bass / Steady pace, / Take a box, / One that rocks, / Take a blue horn New Orleans-born. / Take a stick / With a lick, / Take a bone, / Dixie-grown, / Take a spot, / Cool and hot, / Now you has jazz jazz jazz, jazz, jazz.
quotes.author: Cole Porter

quotes.quote: Now there's young cats blowin' / And more and more people, yes they will be knowin' / Jazz ain't the past, this music's gonna last / And as the facts unfold, remember who foretold.
quotes.author: Keith Elam

quotes.quote: He's still in a state of denial. He didn't really want to come forward and let the guys down. He didn't blow the whistle. I did, and I'm proud of it.
quotes.author: Mark Jones

quotes.quote: It's not denial. I'm just selective about the reality I accept.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Denial ain't just a river in Egypt.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of denial.
quotes.author: Wes Bently

quotes.quote: The worst lies are the lies we tell ourselves. We live in denial of what we do, even what we think. We do this because we're afraid. We fear we will not find love, and when we find it we fear we'll lose it. We fear that if we do not have love we will be unhappy.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Sometimes reality has a way of sneaking up and biting us in the ass. And when the dam bursts, all you can do is swim. The world of pretend is a cage, not a cocoon. We can only lie to ourselves for so long. We are tired, we are scared, denying it doesn't change the truth. Sooner or later we have to put aside our denial and face the world. Head on, guns blazing. De Nile. It's not just a river in Egypt, it's a freakin' ocean. So how do you keep from drowning in it?
quotes.author: Meredith Grey

quotes.quote: Defensiveness often reveals an area of our lives where we're in denial.
quotes.author: Kyle Idleman

quotes.quote: Denial is the worst form of the truth
quotes.author: Ella The Wise and powerful

quotes.quote: God's delays are not god's denials.
quotes.author: Robert Schuller

quotes.quote: Never think that God's delays are God's denials. Hold on; hold fast; hold out. Patience is genius.
quotes.author: Georges-Louis Leclere De Buffon

quotes.quote: There are those have a desire to love, but do not have the capacity to love.
quotes.author: Giovanni Papini

quotes.quote: She's in that state of mind that she wants to deny something -only she doesn't know what to deny!
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: It is the denial of death that is partially responsible for people living empty, purposeless lives; for when you live as if you'll live forever, it becomes too easy to postpone the things you know that you must do.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Kubler Ross

quotes.quote: Of all the weaknesses little men rail against, there is none that they are more apt to ridicule than the tendency to believe. And of all the signs of a corrupt heart and a feeble head, the tendency of incredulity is the surest. Real philosophy seeks rather to solve than to deny.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: The weather today is an increasing trend towards denial.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Think occasionally of the suffering of which you spare yourself the sight.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Self denial is not a virtue: it is only the effect of prudence on rascality.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: There never will exist anything permanently noble and excellent in the character which is a stranger to resolute self-denial.
quotes.author: Sir Walter Scott

quotes.quote: Wonder is not a Pollyanna stance, not a denial of reality; wonder is an acknowledgment of the power of the mind to transform.
quotes.author: Christina Baldwin

quotes.quote: Fat is a way of saying ''no'' to powerlessness and self-denial.
quotes.author: Susie Orbach

quotes.quote: No denial of the truth will ever invalidate it.
quotes.author: Nikki Rosen

quotes.quote: Doubt, indulged and cherished, is in danger of becoming denial; but if honest, and bent on thorough investigation, it may soon lead to full establishment of the truth.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Liberty, when it begins to take root, is a plant of rapid growth.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: What light is to the eyes - what air is to the lungs - what love is to the heart, liberty is to the soul of man.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: When in a relationship, a real man doesn't make his woman jealous of others, he makes others jealous of his woman.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: If you're jealous of someone else it simply means you have not come to a true acceptance and appreciation of yourself.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: Never get jealous when you see your ex with someone else because our parents taught us to give our used toys to the less fortunate.
quotes.author: Sonia Mendoza

quotes.quote: I get jealous because I'm afraid someone is going to you happier than I do.
quotes.author: Prakhar Sahay

quotes.quote: A jealous woman does better research than the FBI.
quotes.author: Aetiyuel Williams

quotes.quote: If she jealous, she cares.
quotes.author: Joy Hunter

quotes.quote: Oh no, was I to be one of those girls who gets attacked by a jealous girlfriend.
quotes.author: Jenna Elizabeth Johnson

quotes.quote: I'm not scared to admit that I'm a jealous girl. What's mine is mine, and that's that.
quotes.author: C. R. Van Anden

quotes.quote: If your girlfriend gets jealous it's because she's faithful. If another girl has your attention and she doesn't get jealous, it's because someone has hers.
quotes.author: Moses Gazman Mukhansi

quotes.quote: A jealous woman is the most dangerous one.
quotes.author: Kelly Beckman

quotes.quote: It is ridiculous to hang out with your girlfriend who gets jealous at everybody.
quotes.author: Robin Talley

quotes.quote: I believe that it isn’t normal to get jealous without any reason. There must be something that leads someone to become jealous.
quotes.author: Chad David

quotes.quote: There would be no jealous women if men are all loyal.
quotes.author: Nina van der Plas

quotes.quote: I must agree that every girl is jealous by nature.
quotes.author: Deborah O. Keefe

quotes.quote: I must admit that at one point in my life I get jealous over nothing and it causes me sleepless night.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: A jealous girlfriend is a faithful girlfriend. You should worry if she doesn't care.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Anger and jealousy can no more bear to lose sight of their objects than love.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: A jealous girlfriend is a faithful girlfriend, if she gets jealous its because someone has your attention, if she doesnt get jealous, its because someone else has hers.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Yeah, that's exactly what I want. To help my girlfriend get her old boyfriend back.
quotes.author: Richelle Mead

quotes.quote: Jealousy is the dragon in paradise; the hell of heaven; and the most bitter of the emotions because associated with the sweetest.
quotes.author: Alfred Richard Orage

quotes.quote: Jealousy is the dragon in paradise, the hell of heaven, and the most bitter of the emotions because associated with the sweetest.
quotes.author: A.R. Orage

quotes.quote: I'm not a jealous person. I'm just a girl that would love to punch every other girl in the face that gives you a second look.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: You should never underestimate the power of your girlfriend. She has the ability to make anything your fault.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: People were hurt, and because they were hurt, they were angry and quarreled and were jealous of one another.
quotes.author: Emanuel Celler

quotes.quote: People is, I think, it's their nature - some people's nature, in a way, to be angry or jealous or just spiteful about somebody else's blessings.
quotes.author: Jill Scott

quotes.quote: Photography has become a small world with so many jealous people. You do a story and then a lot of people try to do the same thing.
quotes.author: Sebastiao Salgado

quotes.quote: The worst part of success is trying to find someone who is happy for you.
quotes.author: Bette Midler

quotes.quote: Jealousy is a disease, love is a healthy condition. The immature mind often mistakes one for the other, or assumes that the greater the love, the greater the jealousy - in fact, they are almost incompatible; one emotion hardly leaves room for the other.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: A lot of people get so hung up on what they can't have that they don't think for a second about whether they really want it.
quotes.author: Lionel Shriver

quotes.quote: Jealousy is no more than feeling alone against smiling enemies.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: He that is not jealous is not in love.
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.quote: Jealousy in romance is like salt in food. A little can enhance the savor, but too much can spoil the pleasure and, under certain circumstances, can be life-threatening.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Jealousy... is a mental cancer.
quotes.author: B.C. Forbes

quotes.quote: Jealousy is that pain which a man feels from the apprehension that he is not equally beloved by the person whom he entirely loves.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Humans are suspicious and jealous creatures. When they see something perfect, they want to find a flaw.
quotes.author: Gosho Aoyama

quotes.quote: He who is jealous, is never jealous of what you see, with what is imagined is enough.
quotes.author: Jacinto Benavente

quotes.quote: Jealousy is both reasonable and belongs to reasonable men, while envy is base and belongs to the base, for the one makes himself get good things by jealousy, while the other does not allow his neighbour to have them through envy.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Potter is jealous of potter, and craftsman of craftsman; and the poor have a grudge against the poor, and the poet against the poet.
quotes.author: Hesiod

quotes.quote: The envious person grows lean with the fatness of their neighbor.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Plain women are always jealous of their husbands. Beautiful women never are. They are always so occupied with being jealous of other women's husbands.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: If you find happiness, people may be jealous. Be happy anyway.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: The only woman a wife should ever be jealous of is her husband's mom.
quotes.author: Jason Thomas

quotes.quote: When you're a beautiful person on the inside, nothing in the world can change that about you. Jealousy is the result of one's lack of self-confidence, self-worth, and self-acceptance. The Lesson: If you can't accept yourself, then certainly no one else will.
quotes.author: Sasha Azevedo

quotes.quote: Resentment is like drinking poison and waiting for the other person to die.
quotes.author: Carrie Fisher

quotes.quote: For where envying and strife is, there is confusion and every evil work.
quotes.author: James 3:16

quotes.quote: Hell hath no fury like a woman scorned.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.quote: The venom clamours of a jealous woman poison more deadly than a mad dog's tooth.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Cruelty has a human heart, And Jealousy a human face; Terror the human form divine, And Secrecy the human dress.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: The jealous are possessed by a mad devil and a dull spirit at the same time.
quotes.author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.quote: The envious man grows lean at the success of his neighbour.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Do not envy a sinner; you don't know what disaster awaits him.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: Envy can be a positive motivator. Let it inspire you to work harder for what you want.
quotes.author: Robert Bringle

quotes.quote: Never waste jealousy on a real man: it is the imaginary man that supplants us all in the long run.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: For jealous people, like dope-friends, stoop to the lowest level and in the end inspire only disgust and loathing.
quotes.author: Dianna J. Dell

quotes.quote: Envy is the most stupid of vices, for there is no single advantage to be gained from it.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: The jealous bring down the curse they fear upon their own heads.
quotes.author: Dorothy Dix

quotes.quote: Whoever has freed himself from envy and bitterness may begin to try to see things as they are.
quotes.author: John Lancaster Spalding

quotes.quote: A competent and self-confident person is incapable of jealousy in anything. Jealousy is invariably a symptom of neurotic insecurity.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: To cure jealousy is to see it for what it is, a dissatisfaction with self.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: If you allow yourself to be jealous, you cannot love
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: The jealous are troublesome to others, but torment to themselves.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Envy comes from people's ignorance of or lack of belief in, their own gifts.
quotes.author: Jean Vanier

quotes.quote: The jealous person catches, almost imploringly, every beam from the love in the beloved, but through the burning-glass of jealousy he focuses all these beams on his own love and he slowly burns up.
quotes.author: Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Miserly people may have possessions, / jealous people may have friends, / people with evil minds may have knowledge: / they may have these, but these cannot produce joy.
quotes.author: Tibetan Saying

quotes.quote: Never hate jealous people. They are jealous because they think you are better than them.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Envy is ever joined with the comparing of a man's self; and when there is no comparison, no envy.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Beware of... jealousy! It is the green-eyed monster which doth mock / The meat it feeds on.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Jealous souls will not be answered so: / They are not ever jealous for the cause. / But jealous, for they're jealous. It is a monster / Begot upon itself, born on itself.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I've spent most of my life walking under that hovering cloud, jealousy, whose acid raindrops blurred my vision and burned holes in my heart. Once I learned to use the umbrella of confidence, the skies cleared up for me and the sunshine called joy became my faithful companion.
quotes.author: Astrid Alauda

quotes.quote: Do not overrate what you have received, nor envy others. He who envies others does not obtain peace of mind.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Jealousy hyphenates love in all the wrong places.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: It is not love that is blind, but jealousy.
quotes.author: Laurence Durell

quotes.quote: Jealousy injures us with the dagger of self-doubt.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Jealousy is the tribute mediocrity pays to genius.
quotes.author: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.quote: Jealousy—Tormenting yourself, for fear you should be tormented by another.
quotes.author: Paul Chatfield

quotes.quote: Envy is a littleness of soul, which cannot see beyond a certain point, and if it does not occupy the whole space, feels itself excluded.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Anger, resentment, and jealousy don't change the heart of others-- it only changes yours.
quotes.author: Shannon Alder

quotes.quote: Isn't it kind of silly to think that tearing someone else down builds you up?
quotes.author: Sean Covey

quotes.quote: Insecure people only eclipse your sun because they're jealous of your daylight and tired of their dark, starless nights.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: I am jealous of anyone who can make other people care so much.
quotes.author: David Levithan

quotes.quote: What is jealousy but a reflection of your own failures?
quotes.author: Michael Connelly

quotes.quote: You can't be yourself within jealousy.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Those who believe in nothing are very, very jealous and angry at those who believe in something.
quotes.author: Dennis Prager

quotes.quote: Jealousy in romance is like salt in food. A little can enhance the savor, but too much can spoil the pleasure and, under certain circumstances, can be life-threatening.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Jealousy is a disease, love is a healthy condition. The immature mind often mistakes one for the other, or assumes that the greater the love, the greater the jealousy - in fact, they are almost incompatible; one emotion hardly leaves room for the other.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Jealousy, that dragon which slays love under the pretence of keeping it alive.
quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

quotes.quote: The thermometer of success is merely the jealousy of the malcontents.
quotes.author: Salvador Dal

quotes.quote: You can only be jealous of someone who has something you think you ought to have yourself.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: What sort of love is permeated by jealousy? You are jealous because you are unaware that everything you need is inside you.
quotes.author: Peter Deunov

quotes.quote: The jealous are troublesome to others, but a torment to themselves.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: I've spent most of my life walking under that hovering cloud, jealousy, whose acid raindrops blurred my vision and burned holes in my heart. Once I learned to use the umbrella of confidence, the skies cleared up for me and the sunshine called joy became my faithful companion.
quotes.author: Astrid Alauda

quotes.quote: Jealousy is the tribute mediocrity pays to genius.
quotes.author: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.quote: To cure jealousy is to see it for what it is, a dissatisfaction with self
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: Love sees sharply, hatred sees even more sharp, but Jealousy sees the sharpest for it is love and hate at the same time.
quotes.author: Arab Proverb

quotes.quote: Never waste jealousy on a real man: it is the imaginary man that supplants us all in the long run.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Jealousy is simply and clearly the fear that you do not have value. Jealousy scans for evidence to prove the point - that others will be preferred and rewarded more than you. There is only one alternative - self-value. If you cannot love yourself, you will not believe that you are loved. You will always think it's a mistake or luck. Take your eyes off others and turn the scanner within. Find the seeds of your jealousy, clear the old voices and experiences. Put all the energy into building your personal and emotional security. Then you will be the one others envy, and you can remember the pain and reach out to them.
quotes.author: Jennifer James

quotes.quote: Jealousy is never satisfied with anything short of an omniscience that would detect the subtlest fold of the heart.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Jealousy is that pain which a man feels from the apprehension that he is not equally beloved by the person whom he entirely loves.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Jealousy would be far less torturous if we understood that love is a passion entirely unrelated to our merits.
quotes.author: Paul Eldridge

quotes.quote: Jealousy is not a barometer by which the depth of love can be read, it merely records the degree of the lover's insecurity.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Jealousy is one of the wickedest of all the passions. It is that which has been the most fruitful mother of tragedies, murders, and wars. But reprehensible though it is, jealousy is almost rather to be pitied than blamed--its first victims are those who harbour the feeling.
quotes.author: Arthur Lynch

quotes.quote: Jealousy is indeed a poor medium to secure love, but it is a secure medium to destroy one's self-respect. For jealous people, like dope-fiends, stoop to the lowest level and in the end inspire only disgust and loathing.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: Jealousy lives upon doubts. It becomes madness or ceases entirely as soon as we pass from doubt to certainty.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Jealousy is a kind of civil war in the soul, where judgment and imagination are at perpetual jars. This civil dissension in the mind, like that of the body politic, commits great disorders, and lays all waste. Nothing stands safe in its way; Nature, interest, religion, must yield to its fury. It violates contracts, dissolves society, breaks wedlock, betrays friends and neighbours. No body is good, and every one is either doing or designing them a mischief. It has a venom that more or less rankles wherever it bites: And as it reports fancies or facts, so it disturbs its own house as often as other folks.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Surrounded by the flames of jealousy, the jealous one winds up, like the scorpion, turning the poisoned sting against himself.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Envy...since it’s lodgement is in the heart, not the brain, no degree of intellect supplies a guarantee against it.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: A man will do many things to get himself loved. He will do all things to get himself envied.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Oh! How bitter a thing it is to look into happiness through another man’s eyes.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A competent and self-confident person is incapable of jealousy in anything. Jealousy is invariably a symptom of neurotic insecurity.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Jealousy is both reasonable and belongs to reasonable men, while envy is base and belongs to the base, for the one makes himself get good things by jealousy, while the other does not allow his neighbour to have them through envy.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The jealous are possessed by a mad devil and a dull spirit at the same time.
quotes.author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.quote: To jealousy, nothing is more frightful than laughter.
quotes.author: F. Sagan

quotes.quote: O jealousy! thou magnifier of trifles.
quotes.author: Johann Christoph Friedrich von Schiller

quotes.quote: Jealousy is the jaundice of the soul.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Comparison is a very foolish attitude, because each person is unique and incomparable. Once this understanding settles in you, jealousy disappears.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: More men die of jealousy than of cancer.
quotes.author: Joseph P. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Love may be blind but jealousy has 20-20 vision.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I refused to believe that love could take any other form than mine: I measured love by the extent of my jealousy, and by that standard of course she could not love me at all.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: If you could untie your wings and free your soul of jealousy, you and everyone around you would fly up like doves.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: It will be found an unjust and unwise jealousy to deprive a man of his natural liberty upon the supposition he may abuse it.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Jealousy is all the fun you think they had.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Jealousy - that jumble of secret worship and ostensible aversion.
quotes.author: Emil Cioran

quotes.quote: Jealousy is, I think, the worst of all faults because it makes a victim of both parties.
quotes.author: Gene Tierney

quotes.quote: Jealousy is the tie that binds, and binds, and binds.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Jealousy is a dog's bark which attracts thieves.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: Jealousy is cruel as the grave: the coals thereof are coals of fire.
quotes.author: Solomon Ibn Gabirol

quotes.quote: There is a sort of jealousy which needs very little fire: it is hardly a passion, but a blight bred in the cloudy, damp despondency of uneasy egoism.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Jealousy isn't a pleasant quality, but if it isn't overdone (and if it's combined with modesty), apart from its inconvenience there's even something touching about it.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: The worst part of success is trying to find someone who is happy for you.
quotes.author: Bette Midler

quotes.quote: Count your blessings, not your problems. Count your own blessings, not someone else's. Remember that jealousy is when you count someone else's blessings instead of your own.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: It is not love that is blind, but jealousy.
quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

quotes.quote: Beware... of jealousy! / It is the green-eyed monster, which doth mock / The meat it feeds on.
quotes.author: (Iago), William Shakespeare, Othello

quotes.quote: Trifles light as air /Are to the jealous confirmations strong / As proofs of holy writ.
quotes.author: (Iago), William Shakespeare, Othello

quotes.quote: Jealous souls will not be answered so: / They are not ever jealous for the cause, / But jealous for they're jealous. / It is a monster / Begot upon itself, born on itself.
quotes.author: (Emilia), William Shakespeare, Othello

quotes.quote: Where love reigns, disturbing jealousy / Doth call himself affection's sentinel.
quotes.author: (Venus), William Shakespeare, Venus and Adonis

quotes.quote: A jealous ear hears all things.
quotes.author: Wisdom of Solomon

quotes.quote: Jealousy is a terrible thing. It resembles love, only it is precisely love's contrary. Instead of wishing for the welfare of the object loved, it desires the dependence of that object upon itself, and its own triumph.
quotes.author: Henri-Frédéric Amiel

quotes.quote: Of all the passions, jealousy is that which exacts the hardest service, and pays the bitterest wages. Its service is - to watch the success of our enemy; its wages - to be sure of it.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Moral indignation is jealousy with a halo.
quotes.author: Herbert George (H.G.) Wells

quotes.quote: There will be no common faith between those who share in power, and each man will be jealous of his associate.
quotes.author: Lucan

quotes.quote: Though jealousy be produced by love, as ashes are by fire, yet jealousy extinguishes love as ashes smother the flame.
quotes.author: Margaret of Angoulême

quotes.quote: I lost my first race at school and I was so jealous when the winner received a puppet that I said to myself, "I will carry on until I win a puppet."
quotes.author: Svetlana Masterkova

quotes.quote: Curious thing, plain women are always jealous of their husbands, beautiful women never are!
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Turn thee from these, or dare not to enquire / Of Him whose Name is Jealous, lest in wrath, / He hear and answer thine unblest desire: / Far better we should cross His lightning's path, / Than be according to our idols heard, / And God should take us at our own vain word.
quotes.author: Keble

quotes.quote: It is my nature's plague / To spy into abuses, and oft my jealousy / Shapes faults that are not.
quotes.author: (Iago), William Shakespeare, Othello

quotes.quote: The heart of the envious is gall and bitterness; his tongue spitteth venom; the success of his neighbor breaketh his rest. He sitteth in his cell repining; and the good that happeneth to another, is to him an evil. Hatred and malice feed upon his heart, and there is no rest in him.
quotes.author: Akhenaton

quotes.quote: Jealousy aims at the peaks; the winds storm the loftiest summits.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: What a plague of one's thoughts, how great a rust of the heart, to be jealous of another.
quotes.author: Cyprian

quotes.quote: Jealousy is always born with love, but does not die with it. In jealousy there is more of self-love than of love to another.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: There is no greater glory than love, nor any greater punishment than jealousy.
quotes.author: Felix Lope de Vega

quotes.quote: Jealousy is nothing but the foolish child of pride.
quotes.author: Pierre-Augustin de Beaumarchais

quotes.quote: Jealousy is the very reverse of understanding, of sympathy, and of generous feeling. Never has jealousy added to character, never does it make the individual big and fine.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: Jealousy is fueled by powerful, blinding masochism, in which the offended person revels in his or her victimization... The masochist searches for evidence that will inflict more pain and takes delight in increasingly abhorrent discoveries. Jealousy demonstrates the joy of suffering and the allure of pain.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.quote: Jealousy is like a hot pepper. Use it mildly, and you add spice to the relationship. Use too much of it and it can burn.
quotes.author: Ayala Pines

quotes.quote: Women detest a jealous man whom they do not love, but it angers them when a man they do love is not jealous.
quotes.author: L'Enclos

quotes.quote: O, Jealousy, thou ugliest fiend of hell! thy deadly venom preys on my vitals, turns the healthful hue of my fresh cheek to haggard sallowness, and drinks my spirit up.
quotes.author: H. More

quotes.quote: Jealousy is said to be the offspring of love; yet unless the parent makes haste to strangle the child, the child will not rest till it has poisoned the parent.
quotes.author: Hare

quotes.quote: It is with jealousy as with the gout; when such distempers are in the blood there is never any security against their breaking out, and that often on the slightest occasions, and when least suspected.
quotes.author: Fielding

quotes.quote: All jealousy must be strangled in its birth, or time will soon make it strong enough to overcome the truth.
quotes.author: Davenant

quotes.quote: Jealousy is the fear or apprehension of superiority; envy our uneasiness under it.
quotes.author: Shenstone

quotes.quote: We are jealous of a rival, while we are envious of what other people have.
quotes.author: Jean le Rond d'Alembert

quotes.quote: Jealousy is no more than feeling alone against smiling enemies.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: No true love there can be without its dread penalty - jealousy.
quotes.author: Edward George Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Jealousy blinds the stricken heart, and without examining, believes everything it fears.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: A little jealousy arouses a happy love that is asleep.
quotes.author: Antoinette Deshoulieres

quotes.quote: Jealous people destroy what they are incapable of creating.
quotes.author: Paul Guth

quotes.quote: Jealousy which keeps silent grows in its silence.
quotes.author: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Lovers may be—and indeed generally are—enemies, but they never can be friends, because there must always be a spice of jealousy and a something of Self in all their speculations.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: It would be spiteful to put a Jellyfish in a trifle.
quotes.author: Karl Pilkington

quotes.quote: What we see before us is just one tiny part of the world. We get in the habit of thinking, this is the world, but that's not true at all. The real world is a much darker and deeper place than this, and much of it is occupied by jellyfish and things.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: I’m wearing shoes made of sea foam, and I am here to seduce the elderly. If you brought the geriatrics, then I brought the jellyfish.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: Truth on our level is a different thing from truth for the jellyfish.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: I'd like to be a jellyfish, 'cause jellyfish don't pay rent.
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.quote: Do you see the slightest evidence anywhere in the universe that creation came to an end with the birth of man? Do you see the slightest evidence anywhere out there that man was the climax toward which creation had been straining from the beginning? ...Very far from it. The universe went on as before, the planet went on as before. Man's appearance caused no more stir than the appearance of jellyfish.
quotes.author: Daniel Quinn

quotes.quote: Jelly fish don't worry about tomorrow.
quotes.author: Mike Dodd

quotes.quote: Why worry when a jelly fish is morally superior to mankind?
quotes.author: Mike Dodd

quotes.quote: We need to encourage an attitude of constant questioning, which is a genuine part of our potential as students. If students were required to drop their questions that would create armies of zombies- rows of jellyfish. The questioning mind is absolutely necessary.
quotes.author: Chogyam Trungpa

quotes.quote: Mort... had about the same talent for horticulture that you would find in a dead starfish.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: The sea is the lands's edge also, the granite / Into which it reaches, the beaches where it tosses / Its hints of earlier and other creation: / The starfish, the hermit crab, the whales's backbone; / The pools where it offers to our curiosity / The more delicate algae and the sea anemone.
quotes.author: John Bartlett

quotes.quote: Spread out (the sun) like a jellyfish.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: The fact that jellyfish have survived for 650 million years without brains should give hope to some people.
quotes.author: Karel Dekyvere

quotes.quote: My philosophy is to float like a jellyfish and let the market push me where it wants to go. I try to figure out what strategies are working in the market. One year it might be momentum, another year it might be value.
quotes.author: Stuart Walton

quotes.quote: If you can make jellyfish motivational, you are a bad ass.
quotes.author: Peri Kinder

quotes.quote: That's a reusable grocery bag. This market doesn't use plastic bags because they end up on the oceans and interfere with jellyfish mating habits.
quotes.author: Lisa Simpson

quotes.quote: You are a jellyfish, a motherly, motherly jellyfish protecting the sanctity of your relationship. You need to sting the threats to your relationship, and if you need to sting him in the process, you gotta sting him.
quotes.author: Paul Murphy

quotes.quote: Gotta go somewhere / When you die / So why not see the world / Through jellyfish eyes / Jellyfish heaven / Where jellyfish go / To get away from Mormons / And drunk Eskimos / Jellyfish heaven / Is a lot / Like LA / If you're bad / You'll go to hell / And jellyfish will sting you / And your body will swell / Jellyfish heaven / In the big blue sea / Where it's too cold to surf / And it's too warm to ski / Jellyfish Heaven / Is full of dead / Jellyfish / People always saying.
quotes.author: Joe Genaro

quotes.quote: I used to stand proud like a sphinx / In a noble immovable state / Then your heart nailed me under a jinx / Now I'm feeling like a jellyfish / Just a spineless wobbly jellyfish / And it's great, great, so great.
quotes.author: A. Partridge

quotes.quote: When you move like a jellyfish / Rhythm don't mean nothing / You go with the flow / You don't stop / Move like a jellyfish / Rhythm is nothing / You go with the flow / You don't stop.
quotes.author: Jack Hody Johnson

quotes.quote: Step not jauntily, not too grave, / Till the lip of the languorous sea you greet; / Wait till the wash of the thirteenth wave / Tumbles a jellyfish out at your feet. / Not too hopefully, not forlorn, / Whisper a word of your earnest quest; / Shed not a tear if he turns in scorn / And sneers in your face like a fish possessed. / Hist! Hope on! There is yet a way. / Brooding jellyfish won't be gay.
quotes.author: Clarence Michael James Stanislaus Dennis

quotes.quote: Don't think to go for a refreshing swim! / Jellyfish come beneath the surface dim! / Maybe at home, the things can turn out cool, / But your car stops because it's out of fuel.
quotes.author: Marieta Maglas

quotes.quote: The Jellyfish / Medusas, miserable heads / With hairs of violet / You enjoy the hurricane / And I enjoy the very same.
quotes.author: Guillaume Apollinaire

quotes.quote: Life is a beautiful magnificent thing, even to a jellyfish.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: Jellyfish are 97% water or something, so how much are they doing? Just give them another 3% and make them water. It's more useful.
quotes.author: Karl Pilkington

quotes.quote: Jellyfish serve as a model for bioengineers for the same reason yeast were once so valuable to geneticists: they're simple to deconstruct.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Kluger

quotes.quote: The jellyfish doesn't actively move anywhere - it's just moved with the tides. Is that what man is? Man's just the jellyfish: stuff happens to you, and you get twisted in different directions.
quotes.author: Andrew Buchan

quotes.quote: A jellyfish is little more than a pulsating bell, a tassel of trailing tentacles and a single digestive opening through which it both eats and excretes - as regrettable an example of economy of design as ever was.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Kluger

quotes.quote: When you move like a jellyfish, rhythm is nothing. You go with the flow. You don't stop.
quotes.author: Jack Johnson

quotes.quote: We are all jellyfish, too pitiful and too afraid of being disliked to be honest.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: A person without conviction is a weak, jellyfish type of individual who mindlessly follows the crowd.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Without Jerusalem, the land of Israel is as a body without a soul.
quotes.author: Elhanan Leib Lewinsky

quotes.quote: The view of Jerusalem is the history of the world; it is more, it is the history of earth and of heaven.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Jerusalem is a port city on the shore of eternity.
quotes.author: Yehuda Amichai

quotes.quote: Jerusalem the golden, with milk and honey blessed, beneath thy contemplation sink heart and voice oppressed.
quotes.author: John Mason Neale

quotes.quote: Ten measures of beauty descended to the world, nine were taken by Jerusalem and one by the rest of the world. Jerusalem is a beauty unparalleled.
quotes.author: Talmud

quotes.quote: One doesn't go to Jerusalem, one returns to it. That's one of its mysteries.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: When a Jew visits Jerusalem for the first time, it is not the first time; it is homecoming.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: In the din and tumult of the age, the still small voice of Jerusalem remains our only music.
quotes.author: Israel Zangwill

quotes.quote: You ought to let the Jews have Jerusalem; it was they who made it famous.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Jerusalem is old, Jerusalem is new, Jerusalem can hold Muslim, Christian, Jew.
quotes.author: Don McLean

quotes.quote: Jerusalem doesn't belong only to Israelis and Palestinians, Muslims and Jews, but to the world.
quotes.author: A. B. Yehoshua

quotes.quote: Jerusalem will always be the capital of Israel, even if someday a peace agreement were to be reached.
quotes.author: Katie Pavlich

quotes.quote: Jerusalem is holy to three religions. You have to respect that.
quotes.author: Recep Tayyip Erdogan

quotes.quote: Jerusalem is a festival and a lamentation. Its song is a sigh across the ages, a delicate, robust, mournful psalm at the great junction of spiritual cultures.
quotes.author: David K. Shipler

quotes.quote: Jerusalem will remain the capital of Israel, and it must remain undivided.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Whoever did not see Jerusalem in its days of glory, never saw a beautiful city in their life.
quotes.author: Talmud

quotes.quote: Jerusalem itself, understand what power is, understand what glory is, understand at all.
quotes.author: Tim Rice

quotes.quote: No city in the world, not even Athens or Rome, ever played as great a role in the life of a nation for so long a time, as Jerusalem has done in the life of the Jewish people.
quotes.author: David Ben-Gurion

quotes.quote: In the din and tumult of the age, the still small voice of Jerusalem remains our only music.
quotes.author: Israel Zangwill

quotes.quote: Jerusalem is united, will never be divided again.
quotes.author: Yitzhak Rabin

quotes.quote: Jerusalem should not tolerate any religious war.
quotes.author: Reuven Rivlin

quotes.quote: The capital of Israel is Jerusalem, no matter what.
quotes.author: Benny Gantz

quotes.quote: Eternity this refers to Jerusalem.
quotes.author: Talmud

quotes.quote: I know that all things are possible through Jesus Christ.
quotes.author: Jason Derulo

quotes.quote: The Lord Jesus Christ is our partner, helper and advocate.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ never thinks about what we have been! He always thinks about what we are going to be.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ was an extremist for love, truth and goodness.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ is our spring board to promotion and prosperity.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ, in His infinite love, has become what we are, in order that He may make us entirely what He is.
quotes.author: Irenaeus of Lyons

quotes.quote: The atonement of Jesus Christ is the supreme act of love, the supreme example of selfless concern for others.
quotes.author: Howard W. Hunter

quotes.quote: The love of our Lord Jesus Christ towards sinners is strikingly shown in His steady purpose of heart to die for them.
quotes.author: J. C. Ryle

quotes.quote: The gospel of Jesus Christ is more enduring than fame, more precious than riches, more to be desired than happiness.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: When Jesus Christ forgives you of sin, He never brings it back up.
quotes.author: Johnny Hunt

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ is in every way sufficient to the vast desires of the soul.
quotes.author: John Flavel

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ, the condescension of divinity, and the exaltation of humanity.
quotes.author: Phillip Brooks

quotes.quote: In Jesus Christ, God took on a human face and became our friend and brother.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ is not a security from storms. He is the perfect security in storms.
quotes.author: Kathy Troccoli

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ is, in the noblest and most perfect sense, the realized ideal of humanity.
quotes.author: Johann Gottfried Herder

quotes.quote: Seeing & savoring Jesus Christ is the most important seeing and savoring you'll ever do.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ knows the worst about you. Nonetheless, He is the one who loves you the most.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ's mercy and power indwells us and gives us the strength to make a positive difference.
quotes.author: Jon Foreman

quotes.quote: The life of Jesus Christ is a message of hope, a message of mercy, a message of life in a dark world.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ does not save the worthy, but the unworthy. Your plea must not be righteousness but guilt.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ is both the only price and sacrifice by which eternal redemption is obtained for believers.
quotes.author: Jonathan Edwards

quotes.quote: Not only do we know God through Jesus Christ, we only know ourselves through Jesus Christ.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: The gospel of Jesus Christ is the brightest light and the only hope for this darkened world.
quotes.author: Dallin H. Oaks

quotes.quote: In Jesus Christ we have been chosen from eternity, accepted in time, and united for eternity.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ had a sense of destiny.
quotes.author: T. B. Joshua

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ was God's revenue officer.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ is God's everything for man's total need.
quotes.author: Richard Halverson

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ is the only God who has a date in history.
quotes.author: Dorothy L. Sayers

quotes.quote: There's no greater model, in my view, than Jesus Christ.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.quote: The religion of Jesus Christ is neither new nor strange.
quotes.author: Eusebius

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ is not just 'my personal Savior'. He is Lord.
quotes.author: John F. Macarthur Jr.

quotes.quote: The Lord, Jesus Christ, is our perfect example of patience.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ is too important to be left to the theologians.
quotes.author: Jaroslav Pelikan

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ turns life right-side-up, and heaven outside-in.
quotes.author: Carl F. H. Henry

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ must be at the heart of every sermon you preach.
quotes.author: Jay Adams

quotes.quote: The only wounds that define us are the wounds of Jesus Christ.
quotes.author: Louie Giglio

quotes.quote: The gospel of Jesus Christ opens the path to what we may become.
quotes.author: D. Todd Christofferson

quotes.quote: Those who truly believe on Jesus Christ are saved from all fear.
quotes.author: R. A. Torrey

quotes.quote: To understand Jesus Christ, you must know the Language of Heaven.
quotes.author: Felix Wantang

quotes.quote: The gospel of Jesus Christ is not a religion of mourning and gloom.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ opened heaven's door for us by His death on the cross.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ is infinitely more than a great teacher and philosopher.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ can help us fix anything that needs fixing in our lives.
quotes.author: M. Russell Ballard

quotes.quote: He has the power to heal and strengthen the soul. He is Jesus Christ.
quotes.author: Per G. Malm

quotes.quote: The blood of Jesus Christ can cover a multitude of sins, it seems to me.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: Our Lord Jesus Christ , my brethren, is our hero, a hero all the world wants.
quotes.author: Gerard Manley Hopkins

quotes.quote: To know Jesus Christ, you must first understand his supernatural identity. He is God.
quotes.author: Felix Wantang

quotes.quote: When the Lord Jesus Christ gives a man remission of sins, He also gives him repentance.
quotes.author: J. C. Ryle

quotes.quote: The cross of Jesus Christ represents the intersection of God's love and God's holiness.
quotes.author: Robert Jeffress

quotes.quote: God, through Jesus Christ, is the victory, and the renewed earth will reflect that glory.
quotes.author: Paul P. Enns

quotes.quote: Jewelry takes people’s minds off your wrinkles!
quotes.author: Sonja Henie

quotes.quote: I’ve always thought of accessories as the exclamation point of a woman’s outfit.
quotes.author: Michael Kors

quotes.quote: You can’t cry on a diamond’s shoulder, and diamonds won’t keep you warm at night, but they are sure fun when the sun shines.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: Jewelry is like the perfect spice - it always complements what’s already there.
quotes.author: Diane Von Furstenberg

quotes.quote: Jewelry should not upstage you. I pick one hot point on my body that I'm going to highlight. Let one area do the singing - you don't want to hear three songs at once.
quotes.author: Padma Lakshmi

quotes.quote: All you need is love . But a little JEWELRY never hurt anybody.
quotes.author: Abby Lowery

quotes.quote: The most precious jewels are not made of stone, but of flesh.
quotes.author: Robert Ludlum

quotes.quote: A piece of jewelry is often a piece of art. But it only becomes valuable when emotions are added to it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Jewelry and pins have been worn throughout history as symbols of power, sending messages. Interestingly enough, it was mostly men who wore the jewelry in various times, and obviously, crowns were part of signals that were being sent throughout history by people of rank.
quotes.author: Madeleine Albright.

quotes.quote: Simple jewelry is best - bigger pieces get in the way when I'm baking.
quotes.author: Christina Tosi
