quotes.quote: O month of flowerings, month of metamorphoses, / May without cloud and June that was stabbed, / I shall never forget the lilac and the roses / Nor those whom spring has kept in its folds.
quotes.author: Louis Aragon

quotes.quote: Not till June can the grass be said to be waving in the fields. When the frogs dream, and the grass waves, and the buttercups toss their heads, and the heat disposes to bathe in the ponds and streams, then is summer begun.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: There are two seasons when the leaves are in their glory, their green and perfect youth in June and this their ripe old age.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: June was not over / Though past the fall, / And the best of her roses / Had yet to blow, / When a man I know / (But shall not discover, / Since ears are dull, / And time discloses) / Turned him and said with a man's true air, / Half sighing a smile in a yawn, as 'twere,— / 'If I tire of your June, will she greatly care?'
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: The brightest light, the light of Italy, the purest sky of Scandinavia in the month of June is only a half-light when one compares it to the light of childhood. Even the nights were blue.
quotes.author: Eugene Ionesco

quotes.quote: It’s so god damn cold it’s gonna snow until June.
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.quote: I gazed upon the glorious sky / And the green mountains round, / And thought that when I came to lie / At rest within the ground, / "Twere pleasant, that in flowery June, / When brooks send up a cheerful tune, / And groves a joyous sound, / The sexton's hand, my grave to make, / The rich, green mountain-turf should break.
quotes.author: William Cullent Bryant

quotes.quote: June is bright with roses gay, / Harebells bloom around her feet.
quotes.author: Dora Goodale

quotes.quote: Under the snowdrift the blossoms are sleeping, / Dreaming their dreams of sunshine and June, / Down in the hush of their quiet they're keeping / Thrills from the throstle's wild summer-swung tune.
quotes.author: Harriet Prescott Spofford

quotes.quote: June is bustin' out all over / All over the meader and the hill / Flowers bustin' out on bushes / And the roughen river pushes / Ev'ry little wheel that wheels beside the mill / June is bustin' out all over / The ocean is full of Jacks and Jills / With the little tail is swishing' / Ev'ry lady fish is wishin' that a male would come / And grab 'er by the gills / Because it's June, June, June, June / Just because it's June, June, June!
quotes.author: Oscar II Hammerstein

quotes.quote: Bye June / I'm going to the moon / It better be by June / 'Cause I'm going to the moon / So June / You'd better make it soon / I hope you make it June / 'Cause I'm going to the moon
quotes.author: William Patrick Corgan

quotes.quote: In the long, sad time, when the sky was grey, / And the keen blast blew through the city drear, / When delight had fled from the night and the day, / My chill heart whispered, "June will be here!" / "June with its roses a-sway in the sun, / Its glory of green on mead and tree." / Lo, now the sweet June-tide is nearly done, / June-tide, and never a joy for me
quotes.author: Amy Levy

quotes.quote: Tell you what I like the best -- / 'Long about knee-deep in June, / 'Bout the time strawberries melts / On the vine, -- some afternoon / Like to jes' git out and rest, / And not work at nothin' else!
quotes.author: James Whitcomb Riley

quotes.quote: Last June I saw your face three times; / Three times I touched your hand; / Now, as before, May month is o'er, / And June is in the land. / O many Junes shall come and go, / Flow'r-footed o'er the mead; / O many Junes for me, to whom / Is length of days decreed. / There shall be sunlight, scent of rose; / Warm mist of summer rain; / Only this change--I shall not look / Upon your face again.
quotes.author: Amy Levy

quotes.quote: Ten o'clock: the broken moon / Hangs not yet a half hour high, / Yellow as a shield of brass, / In the dewy air of June, / Poised between the vaulted sky / And the ocean's liquid glass.
quotes.author: Emma Lazarus

quotes.quote: This is our love in early June, / Fed with the sun and the dew, / Moonlight and roses hid in a tune, / The roses are music through and through, / The moonlight falls in the breath of the rose, / Light and cadence, honey and hue, / Mingle, and murmur, and flow to the close, / I love you, I love you, I love you.
quotes.author: Duncan Campbell Scott

quotes.quote: It's June ag'in, an' in my soul I feel the fillin' joy / That's sure to come this time o' year to every little boy; / For, every June, the Sunday-schools at picnics may be seen, / Where "fields beyont the swellin' floods stand dressed in livin' green"; / Where little girls are skeered to death with spiders, bugs, and ants, / An' little boys get grass-stains on their go-to meetin' pants. / It's June ag'in, an' with it all what happiness is mine - / There's goin' to be a picnic, an' I'm goin' to jine!
quotes.author: Eugene Field

quotes.quote: None of the Jungle People like being disturbed.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: Life in the jungle is a constant struggle for the survival of the fittest
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The biggest jungle in this world is nothing but the human mind.
quotes.author: C. Jay

quotes.quote: In the social jungle of human existence, there is no feeling of being alive without a sense of identity.
quotes.author: Erik Erikson

quotes.quote: Competition is the law of the jungle, but cooperation is the law of civilization
quotes.author: Peter Kropotkin

quotes.quote: Using language like jungle growth isn't the solution to telling a story.
quotes.author: John L'Heureux

quotes.quote: If you want to keep alive in the jungle, you must live as the jungle does.
quotes.author: John Wyndham

quotes.quote: The jungle is alive. It's dangerous as a living nightmare and brimful of hostility.
quotes.author: Sara Sheridan

quotes.quote: Man is lost and is wandering in a jungle where real values have no meaning. Real values can have meaning to man only when he steps on to the spiritual path, a path where negative emotions have no use.
quotes.author: Sai Baba

quotes.quote: The only way to convert the heathen is to travel into the jungle.
quotes.author: Lane Kirkland

quotes.quote: In the jungle, life and food depend on keeping your temper.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: The heart jungle drum beat finds its voice in love and matchsticks.
quotes.author: Isabel Yosito

quotes.quote: The jungle is dark but full of diamonds.
quotes.author: Arthur Miller

quotes.quote: The great thing about this jungle of ours is that anyone of you could grow up to be Lord of the apes.
quotes.author: Gary Larson

quotes.quote: The forest did not tolerate frailty of body or mind. Show your weakness, and it would consume you without hesitation.
quotes.author: Tahir Shah

quotes.quote: The ability to manage well doesn't make much difference if you're not even in the right jungle.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: Wild rejoice in jungles not in cages.
quotes.author: Pushpa Rana

quotes.quote: The jungle looked back at them with a vastness, a breathing moss-and-leaf silence, with a billion diamond and emerald insect eyes.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: Nourish the mind like you would your body. The mind cannot survive on junk food.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: You can't have a healthy civilization without healthy soil. You can't have junk food and have healthy people.
quotes.author: Joel Salatin

quotes.quote: If we're not willing to settle for junk living, we certainly shouldn't settle for junk food.
quotes.author: Sally Edwards

quotes.quote: In my opinion, there's no condition in life that can't be ameliorated by a dose of junk food.
quotes.author: Sue Grafton

quotes.quote: I believe many of us are overnourished on entertainment junk food and undernourished on the bread of life.
quotes.author: Dallin H. Oaks

quotes.quote: Every living cell in your body is made from the food you eat. If you consistently eat junk food then you'll have a junk body.
quotes.author: Jeanette Jenkins

quotes.quote: Violence is spiritual junk food, and boredom is spiritual anorexia.
quotes.author: Peter Kreeft

quotes.quote: Social media can easily become the equivalent of junk food for our soul
quotes.author: Ken Shigematsu

quotes.quote: A society that thinks the choice between ways of living is just a choice between equally eligible 'lifestyles' turns universities into academic cafeterias offering junk food for the mind.
quotes.author: George Will

quotes.quote: Junk food, empty calories and carbs are the big data of the masses.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Having a healthy mind is as important as healthy body. And stress is like junk food to body.
quotes.author: Dr. Sukhraj Dhillon

quotes.quote: If you want to become physically stronger, you'll need healthy habits - like going to the gym. You'll also have to give up unhealthy habits - like eating junk food. Building mental strength requires healthy habits - like practicing gratitude - while also giving up unhealthy behavior, like giving up after the first failure.
quotes.author: Amy Morin

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as junk food, but there are junk diets.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Whelan

quotes.quote: In the constant pursuit of perfection, junk food will always be a rather painful stumbling block.
quotes.author: C.S. Woolley

quotes.quote: We eat junk because it's cheap and it lights up the pleasure centers of our brain.
quotes.author: Linda Tirado

quotes.quote: Junk food is television for tongues.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Some parents sometimes use junk food as a babysitter.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Junk food isn't cheap; we pay a steep price for it years after consuming it.
quotes.author: Joel Fuhrman

quotes.quote: Keep your friends close, your enemies closer, and the junk food as far away as possble.
quotes.author: Krista Scott-Dixon

quotes.quote: If you put junk food in your body, your body will turn to junk.
quotes.author: Goldie Hawn

quotes.quote: Eat less, move more, eat lots of fruits and vegetables, go easy on junk foods.
quotes.author: Marion Nestle

quotes.quote: Junk food life every day of the season. I eat so much I'm 40 percent junk food.
quotes.author: Hoodie Cat

quotes.quote: Junk food forever. Late nights together.
quotes.author: The Amazons

quotes.quote: You know that junk food gets me in the mood.
quotes.author: The Donnas

quotes.quote: Junk food are the only contributors to overweight and obesity - clearly a sedentary lifestyle.
quotes.author: Andrew F. Smith

quotes.quote: The term "junk food" was first used in the 1960s.
quotes.author: Andrew F. Smith

quotes.quote: A jury consists of twelve persons chosen to decide who has the better lawyer.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: A jury is composed of twelve men of average ignorance.
quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

quotes.quote: If a jury have not the right to judge between the government and those who disobey its laws, and resist its oppressions, the government is absolute, and the people, legally speaking, are slaves.
quotes.author: Lysander Spooner

quotes.quote: The jury has a right to judge both the law as well as the fact in controversy.
quotes.author: John Jay

quotes.quote: A jury too often has at least one member more ready to hang the panel than to hang the traitor.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The jury has the power to bring a verdict in the teeth of both law and fact.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quotes.quote: Normally a grand jury will indict a ham sandwich if a prosecutor asks it to.
quotes.author: Chuck Robb

quotes.quote: Had the jury convicted on proper instructions it would be the end of the matter. But juries are not bound by what seems inescapable logic to judges.
quotes.author: Robert H. Jackson

quotes.quote: The jury system puts a ban upon intelligence and honesty, and a premium upon ignorance, stupidity and perjury.
quotes.author: S. L. Clemens

quotes.quote: If the jury have no right to judge of the justice of a law of the government, they plainly can do nothing to protect the people against the oppressions of the government; for there are no oppressions which the government may not authorize by law.
quotes.author: Lysander Spooner

quotes.quote: The jury has the right to determine both the law and the facts.
quotes.author: Samuel Chase

quotes.quote: It takes courage to sit on a jury. How many of us want to decide the fate of another person's life or freedom? How many of us want to hold that kind of power in our hands?
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.quote: Jury selection is strictly an emotional process. They're looking for people they can manipulate. Both sides are.
quotes.author: Joseph Wambaugh

quotes.quote: When a jury permits a guilty man to escape, it augments the danger of the innocent
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Jury lawlessness is the greatest corrective of law in its actual administration.
quotes.author: Roscoe Pound

quotes.quote: A jury is more apt to be unbiased and independent than a court, but they very seldom stand up against strong public clamor. Judges naturally believe the defendant is guilty.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: The verdict of a jury is the a priori opinion of that juror who smokes the worst cigars.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Where justice is denied, where poverty is enforced, where ignorance prevails, and where any one class is made to feel that society is an organized conspiracy to oppress, rob and degrade them, neither persons nor property will be safe.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: In matters of truth and justice, there is no difference between large and small problems, for issues concerning the treatment of people are all the same.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The dead cannot cry out for justice. It is a duty of the living to do so for them.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: There may be times when we are powerless to prevent injustice, but there must never be a time when we fail to protest.
quotes.author: Elie Weasel

quotes.quote: Social justice cannot be attained by violence. Violence kills what it intends to create.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: Justice will not be served until those who are unaffected are as outraged as those who are.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: We are not to simply bandage the wounds of victims beneath the wheels of injustice, we are to drive a spoke into the wheel itself.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: If one really wishes to know how justice is administered in a country, one does not question the policemen, the lawyers, the judges, or the protected members of the middle class. One goes to the unprotected--those, precisely, who need the law's protection most!--and listens to their testimony.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: Men often mistake killing and revenge for justice. They seldom have the stomach for justice.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: Justice? -- You get justice in the next world. In this one you have the law.
quotes.author: William Gaddis

quotes.quote: Courage is of no value unless accompanied by justice; yet if all men became just, there would be no need for courage.
quotes.author: Agesilaus the Second

quotes.quote: Justice requires that to lawfully constituted Authority there be given that respect and obedience which is its due; that the laws which are made shall be in wise conformity with the common good; and that, as a matter of conscience all men shall render obedience to these laws.
quotes.author: Pope Pius XI

quotes.quote: Laws catch flies but let hornets go free.
quotes.author: Scottish (on justice)

quotes.quote: Justice is the constant and perpetual will to allot to every man his due.
quotes.author: Domitus Ulpian

quotes.quote: Justice consists not in being neutral between right and wrong, but in finding out the right and upholding it, wherever found, against the wrong.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Little thieves are hanged but great ones escape.
quotes.author: 14th Century French Proverb

quotes.quote: Justice is conscience, not a personal conscience but the conscience of the whole of humanity.
quotes.author: Alexander Solzhenitsyn

quotes.quote: Equal justice under law is not merely a caption on the facade of the Supreme Court building, it is perhaps the most inspiring ideal of our society. It is one of the ends for which our entire legal system exists...it is fundamental that justice should be the same, in substance and availability, without regard to economic status.
quotes.author: Lewis Powell, Jr.

quotes.quote: If we do not maintain justice, justice will not maintain us.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: The failure to invest in civil justice is directly related to the increase in criminal disorder. The more people feel there is injustice the more it becomes part of their psyche.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Joseph

quotes.quote: Throughout history, it has been the inaction of those who could have acted, the indifference of those who should have known better, the silence of the voice of justice when it mattered most, that has made it possible for evil to triumph.
quotes.author: Haile Selassie

quotes.quote: Justice is the means by which established injustices are sanctioned.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: This thing that men call justice, this blind snake that strikes men down in the dark, mindless with fury, keep your hand back from it, pass by in silence.
quotes.author: Maxwell Anderson

quotes.quote: The just man is not the product of a day, but of a long brooding and a painful birth. To become a power for peace, a man must first pass through experiences which lead him to see things in their different aspects: it is necessary that he have a wide horizon, and breathe various atmospheres--in a word, from crossing, one after another, paths and points of view the most diverse, and sometimes the most contradictory, he must acquire the faculty of putting himself in the place of others and appreciating them.
quotes.author: Charles Wagner

quotes.quote: The need for justice grows out of the conflict of human interests. That is to say, if there were no conflict of interests among mankind we should never have invented the word justice, nor conceived the idea for which it stands.
quotes.author: Thomas Nixon Carver

quotes.quote: Justice is always violent to the party offending, for every man is innocent in his own eyes.
quotes.author: Daniel Defoe

quotes.quote: Justice is the tolerable accommodation of the conflicting interests of society, and I don't believe there is any royal road to attain such accommodation concretely.
quotes.author: Judge Learned Hand

quotes.quote: The whole history of the world is summed up in the fact that, when nations are strong, they are not always just, and when they wish to be just, they are no longer strong.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Injustice is relatively easy to bear; it is justice that hurts.
quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Justice should remove the bandage from her eyes long enough to distinguish between the vicious and the unfortunate.
quotes.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Justice in the life and conduct of the State is possible only as first it resides in the hearts and souls of the citizens
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Peace is not the absence of war but the presence of justice.
quotes.author: Harrison Ford

quotes.quote: Where there are too many policemen, there is no liberty. Where there are too many soldiers, there is no peace. Where there are too many lawyers, there is no justice.
quotes.author: Lyn Yutang

quotes.quote: The administration of justice is the firmest pillar of government
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Law in origin was merely a codification of the power of dominant groups, and did not aim at anything that to a modern man would appear to be justice
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The best safeguard against fascism is to establish social justice to the maximum extent possible.
quotes.author: Arnold Toynbee

quotes.quote: Justice has nothing to do with what goes on in a courtroom; Justice is what comes out of a courtroom
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: In the halls of justice, the only justice is in the halls.
quotes.author: Lenny Bruce

quotes.quote: You know, the courts may not be working any more, but as long as everyone is videotaping everyone else, justice will be done.
quotes.author: Marge Simpson

quotes.quote: Justice is incidental to law and order.
quotes.author: John Edgar Hoover

quotes.quote: A sense of justice is a noble fancy.
quotes.author: Esaias Tegnér

quotes.quote: The foundation of justice is good faith.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: The love of justice is, in most men, nothing more than the fear of suffering injustice
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Extreme justice is often injustice.
quotes.author: Jean Racine

quotes.quote: The deceitful have no friends.
quotes.author: Hindi (Asian Indian) (on justice)

quotes.quote: Justice is a contract of expediency, entered upon to prevent men harming or being harmed.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: A rule isn't unfair if it applies to everyone.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The end doesn't justify the means.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Deserves it! I daresay he does. Many that live deserve death. And some that die deserve life. Can you give it to them? Then do not be too eager to deal out death in judgement. For even the very wise cannot see all ends.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Ladies who play with fire must remember that smoke gets in their eyes.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Truth never damages a cause that is just.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: It is better to risk saving a guilty person than to condemn an innocent one.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The arc of the moral universe is long, but it bends towards justice.
quotes.author: Theodore Parker

quotes.quote: For there is but one essential justice which cements society, and one law which establishes this justice. This law is right reason, which is the true rule of all commandments and prohibitions. Whoever neglects this law, whether written or unwritten, is necessarily unjust and wicked.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Never forget that justice is what love looks like in public.
quotes.author: Cornel West

quotes.quote: I have always found that mercy bears richer fruits than strict justice
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Each of us is more than the worst thing we’ve ever done.
quotes.author: Bryan Stevenson

quotes.quote: Rats and roaches live by competition under the laws of supply and demand; it is the privilege of human beings to live under the laws of justice and mercy.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: Halls of justice painted green / Money talking / Power wolves beset your door / Hear them stalking
quotes.author: Kirk Hammett

quotes.quote:
Brothers are we, marching on the roads of time / From this broken land and the days that defined us / All men are free, justice is a sword we hold / Trusting in the knights noble vow
In the brotherhood that binds us.
quotes.author: Jones

quotes.quote: We lay our case before you / Let your hammer fall / Tip the scales of justice / Liberty for all.
quotes.author: Petery Rooney Byford

quotes.quote: A city of justice, a city of love, a city of peace / For everyone of us / We all need it, can't live without it.
quotes.author: Robert S. Kelly

quotes.quote: Wheels of Justice turning / Bring me home to you / If justice has true meaning / I'll spend my days with you.
quotes.author: James Reeder

quotes.quote: No way out gotta stand strong / Can't you see that I'm not wrong / That's the way it is and can't you see / Street justice for you and me.
quotes.author: Harley Flanagan

quotes.quote: So must we rev'rence God, as first to knows / Justice from Him, not from ourselves, doth flow / God those accepts who to mankind are friends / Whose justice far as their own power extends.
quotes.author: John Denham

quotes.quote: Truth Justice loves, and truth injustice fears, / Truth above all things a just man reveres.
quotes.author: John Denham

quotes.quote: When justice on offenders is not done, / Law, government, and commerce, are o'erthrown.
quotes.author: John Denham

quotes.quote: Justice with weight and measure must proceed / Yet when pronouncing sentence, seem not glad / Such spectacles, though they are just, are sad.
quotes.author: John Denham

quotes.quote: Justice, when equal scales she holds, is blind / Nor cruelty, nor mercy, change her mind.
quotes.author: John Denham

quotes.quote:
WHAT do the scales of Justice hold / Poised even in that steady hand? / What is that measure closely scanned? / Is one side weighted down with gold? / Or is she clamorous for her right?
Surely for that she bides too still!
quotes.author: Bessie Rayner Parkes

quotes.quote: With level brows this Justice stands / And weighs her duties one by one / And if she pleads, or if commands / It is lest these be left undone.
quotes.author: Bessie Rayner Parkes

quotes.quote: Or slurred through weakness and constraint / This noble Justice was not bred / In hearts defiled with any taint / Of selfish seeking, dark and dead.
quotes.author: Bessie Rayner Parkes

quotes.quote:
It is my strong belief / God's justice will heal
The wounds and griefs / I have suffered from that
Years and years.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote:
Before we lose the word / That bids new worlds to birth, / Needs must we loosen first the sword
Of Justice upon earth / Or else all else is vain / Since life on earth began / And the spent world sinks back again / Hopeless of God and Man.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: TWO lawyers to their cause so well adhered / A country justice quite confused appeared / By them the facts were rendered so obscure / With which the truth remained he was not sure.
quotes.author: La Fontaine

quotes.quote: When you've been denied justice... you are incomplete. It feels that God has abandoned you in a stark place. I asked God... I think we all did... what we should do, and he said do what is right. And I thought if I did, it would make me complete again.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: Justice delayed is justice denied.
quotes.author: Edward Allen Bernero

quotes.quote: The conviction that justice involves virtue as well as choice runs deep. Thinking about justice seems inescapably to engage us in thinking about the best way to live.
quotes.author: Michael J. Sandel

quotes.quote: Modern theories of justice try to separate questions of fairness and rights from arguments about honor, virtue, and moral desert.
quotes.author: Michael J. Sandel

quotes.quote: They seek principles of justice that are neural among ends, and enable people to choose and pursue their ends for themselves.
quotes.author: Michael J. Sandel

quotes.quote: Justice discriminates according to merit, according to the relevant excellence.
quotes.author: Michael J. Sandel

quotes.quote: Justice is primarily a possible, but not a necessary, quality of a social order regulating the mutual relations of men.
quotes.author: Hans Kelsen

quotes.quote: The longing for justice is men's eternal longing for happiness. It is happiness that man cannot find alone, as an isolated individual, and hence seeks in sociaty.
quotes.author: Hans Kelsen

quotes.quote: Justice is social happiness. It is happiness guaranteed by a social order.
quotes.author: Hans Kelsen

quotes.quote: The desire for justice is so elementary, and so deeply rooted in the human mind, because it is a manifestation of man's indestructible desire for his own subjective happiness.
quotes.author: Hans Kelsen

quotes.quote: The idea of justice is transformed from a principle guaranteeing the individual happiness of all subjects, into a social order protecting certain interests socially.
quotes.author: Hans Kelsen

quotes.quote: Every system of values, especially a system of morals and its central idea of justice, is a social phenomenon, the product of a society, and hence different according to the nature of the society within which it arises.
quotes.author: Hans Kelsen

quotes.quote: From the beginning men used God to justify the unjustifiable.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: There is no justification without sanctification, no forgiveness without renewal of life, no real faith from which the fruits of new obedience do not grow.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: A reasonable opinion must ever be in danger where reason is not judge.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Defend your beliefs with courtesy and with compassion, but defend them.
quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Holland

quotes.quote: You don't have to defend or explain your decisions to anyone. It's your life. Live it without apologies.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: An explanation of cause is not a justification by reason.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Justified means just as if you've never sinned.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Reason is a necessary instrument, to be used for good or evil, but it has no moral qualities.
quotes.author: Reinhard Bendix

quotes.quote: You have to know what you stand for, not just what you stand against.
quotes.author: Laurie Halse Anderson

quotes.quote: Explanation separates us from astonishment, which is the only gateway to the incomprehensible.
quotes.author: Eugene Ionesco

quotes.quote: To rush into explanations is always a sign of weakness.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: Defending the truth is not something one does out of a sense of duty or to allay guilt complexes, but is a reward in itself.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: As soon as we abandon our own reason, and are content to rely upon authority, there is no end to our troubles.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: For every good reason there is to lie, there is a better reason to tell the truth.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: No trait is more justified than revenge in the right time and place.
quotes.author: Meir Kahane

quotes.quote: Reason is always weak where prejudice is strong.
quotes.author: Norm MacDonald

quotes.quote: Self-justification is the enemy of repentance.
quotes.author: Spencer W. Kimball

quotes.quote: All explanations tend to be self-serving.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: No man is justified in doing evil on the ground of expedience.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Instead of looking at the hundred reasons to quit, look at the thousand reasons not.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Never defend yourself; agree with your critics, it takes the wind out of their sails.
quotes.author: Fay Weldon

quotes.quote: Reason is itself a matter of faith. It is an act of faith to assert that our thoughts have any relation to reality at all.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Reason is man's instrument for arriving at the truth, intelligence is man's instrument for manipulating the world more successfully; the former is essentially human, the latter belongs to the animal part of man.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Reason is not measured by size or height, but by principle.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: You can't defend. You can't prevent. The only thing you can do is detect and respond.
quotes.author: Bruce Schneier

quotes.quote: It is in the nature of the human being to seek a justification for his actions.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quotes.quote: If you can't understand it without an explanation, you can't understand it with an explanation.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Self-justification, therefore, is not only about protecting high self-esteem; it's also about protecting low self-esteem if that is how a person sees himself.
quotes.author: Elliot Aronson

quotes.quote: Don`t waste your time with explanations people only hear what they want to hear.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Justification is the enabler of cowardice. People are capable of abominable acts as long as they can justify it to themselves.
quotes.author: Chris Brady

quotes.quote: If you're trying to justify something, you're trying to escape from something that you don't want to admit to.
quotes.author: Teal Swan

quotes.quote: I justify my craving for control by telling myself that I am alone.
quotes.author: Hilda Gutierrez Baldoquin

quotes.quote: I am like the lost feather that has surrendered its freedom of direction unto the movement and guidance of the wind's current, ready and willing to travel in any direction, trusting in the comfort of the wind's navigation, which may seem uncertain and without direction at the same moment yet in the end, justified in its destination.
quotes.author: Oliver Mbamara

quotes.quote: Whenever we approve, we can find a hundred good reasons to justify our approbation. whenever we dislike, we can find a thousand to justify our dislike.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.quote: Some humans will create illusions in order to justify their desires, choices, or lifestyle.
quotes.author: Steven Mason

quotes.quote: Only a philosophy of eternity, in the world today could justify non-violence.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: History is a tool used by politicians to justify their intentions.
quotes.author: Edward James Martin

quotes.quote: It is not to be forgotten that what we can rational grounds for our benefits are often extremely irrational attempts to justify our instincts.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: The individual who has to justify his existence by his own efforts is in eternal bondage to himself.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Racists are irrational and illogical in their attempts to justify their prejudices.
quotes.author: Sargent Shriver

quotes.quote: Fear of serious injury alone cannot justify oppression of free speech and assembly.
quotes.author: Steven Mason

quotes.quote: Something will happen that will justify it in some way.
quotes.author: Martin Landau

quotes.quote: It's more fun to arrive a conclusion than to justify it.
quotes.author: Malcolm Stevenson Forbes

quotes.quote: Just put them there and say, sir or madam, will you be kind enough to justify your existence.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Self-justification is a treacherous servant.
quotes.author: Wellington Mara

quotes.quote: Every philosophical problem, when it is subjected to the necessary analysis and justification.
quotes.author: Steven Mason

quotes.quote: People who don't believe in GOD may have their own way of justifying some bad act they have committed.
quotes.author: Lee Greenwood

quotes.quote: Saving faith is an immediate relation to Christ, accepting, receiving, resting upon him alone, for justification, sanctification, and eternal life by virtue of God's grace.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: People who don't believe in God may have their own way of justifying some bad act they have committed.
quotes.author: Lee Greenwood

quotes.quote: The law condemns and punishes only actions within certain definite and narrow limits; it thereby justifies, in a way, all similar actions that lie outside those limits.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: There is never any justification for things being complex when they could be simple.
quotes.author: Edward de Bono
